name: Trouble In Terrorist Town SCAR-20
body:
### Welcome 
The SCAR-20 is a semi-automatic sniper which is found in Counter Strike: Global Offensive. I managed to create a version for Trouble In Terrorist Town which is a gamemode for Garrys Mod. The stats are as follows:

`SWEP.Primary.Recoil      = 1.587`
***

`SWEP.Primary.Automatic   = false`
***

`SWEP.Primary.Damage      = 31`
***

`SWEP.Primary.Cone        = 0.003`
***

`SWEP.Primary.Ammo        = "357"`
***

`SWEP.Primary.ClipSize    = 20`
***

`SWEP.Primary.ClipMax     = 40`
***

`SWEP.Primary.DefaultClip = 40`
***

`SWEP.Primary.Sound       = Sound( "scar20_unsil-1.wav" )`
***

`SWEP.HeadshotMultiplier  = 4`

### Downloading
Downloading is as simple as 1, 2, 3. All you do is download the file, and put the files in the corresponding folders.

### Questions?
Create an issue which can be created by going [here](https://github.com/vice655/scar-20/issues). You must have a GitHub account to create an issue.
### Authors and Contributors
All models were re-compiled and re-done by me. ValvE owns these. I simply made all the scripts and ported it from CS:GO down to CS:S which is GMod compatible.

### Think you can do better?
Go and submit a [issue](https://github.com/vice655/scar-20/issues). Remember to insert the code, I will examine and thats that.

Since its in a pre-release state, more updates are expected.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
